cards.name: Scott
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your deck for up to 3 cards in any combination of Supporter cards and Stadium cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Wally's Training
text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokémon. When your turn ends, discard this card.
Search your deck for a card that evolves from your Active Pokémon (choose 1 if there are 2) and put it on your Active Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Altaria ex

ability.name: Mist
ability.text: Any damage done to Altaria ex by attacks from Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dragon Mist
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Deoxys ex

ability.name: Form Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys ex and switch it with Deoxys ex. (Any cards attached to Deoxys ex, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys ex on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Fastwave
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Regirock ex
text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Mend
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Fighting Energy card and attach it to Regirock ex. If you do, remove 1 damage counter from Regirock ex.

attacks.name: Metal Crush
attacks.text: If Registeel ex is in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

cards.name: Registeel ex
text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Block Signal
attacks.text: If Regice ex is in play, flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Wide Laser
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
